availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, farmer. Maryland native. Married to Cynthia Givens Darnall on October 14, 1819. Father of John A. Darnall, Amanda Darnall, Henry A. Darnall, Penelope Darnall, and William H. Darnall. Farmer in Fleming County in 1860. Owned six enslaved persons in 1860.

Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, District 1, p. 87. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, Flemingsburg, p. 14.
